description: Guidance for earlier versions of LIPs

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["We are currently consulting on draft guidance for third Local Implementation Plans (LIPs). The documents on this page relate to earlier versions of LIPs."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
The then-Mayor produced guidance in 2010 that set out requirements and support for London boroughs in producing their second LIPs.

To go along with this, a supplementary note on setting targets for second LIPs was also produced to help boroughs identify and agree LIP targets. Since then, all the boroughs have adopted their second LIP.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Guidance on developing second LIPs - May 2010","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/lip2-guidance-may-2010.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 1.47MB","image":{}},{"title":"Setting targets for second round LIPs","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/setting-targets-for-second-round-lips.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 390KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
The Guidance was published alongside the revised Mayor's Transport Strategy .
Definitions for each of the five mandatory indicators.
